ItemTooltips.blades_of_attack: Need the blades of attack to do the extra damage   so you can lasthit to get the bottle as fast as possible.
ItemTooltips.boots: Try to get all the early game items together so you don't hog the courier to much
ItemTooltips.tpscroll: Always carry tps to gank, always good to have.
ItemTooltips.travel_boots: Great late game item, lets you teleport anywhere on the maps ( thanks to the familars, since you can teleport to them with boots of travel )
ItemTooltips.ring_of_basilius:
Adds armor to your familars, and can help you last hit with the extra damage.
I do not get it all the time but it is a really good item on visage, highly recommand but skippable item.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter:
The best item on visage in my opinion, let's you have a third familar which is goddamn amazing.

Get Point booster first.
then ogre club.
then staff of wizardry.
then blade of alacrity.
ItemTooltips.skadi: Great item that makes you tankier and slow the enemies.

AbilityTooltips.visage_grave_chill: Good slow that can help you rune control in the lane, you can get this at level 1 if you you're going to do a level 1 gank.
AbilityTooltips.visage_soul_assumption: An amawing spell damage spell. But you need to make sure you know how to use it cause you cant waste a lot of mana if you don't know how to use it ( more yellow boxes that are filled, more damage this spell is gonna do )
AbilityTooltips.visage_gravekeepers_cloak: Great spell that makes you tanky. you should get this instead of grave chill at 8-9-10 if you against somebody who got good spell power ( like rocket Tinker), cause this spell gives you good magic resistance.
AbilityTooltips.visage_summon_familiars:
DO NOT FEED THESE, they give 100 gold each.
If used correctly they will kill any hero really easy.
They have extremely high magic resistance (96.25%) but very low physical resistance, so be carefull against physical spells or pure damage spells.
Also helps to have rune control
